## ChatHeaderProps.showCloseButton property

Displays a close button which will invoke [ChatHeaderProps.onClose](./chat-ui-react.chatheaderprops.onclose.md) on click. Default to false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
showCloseButton?: boolean;
```
